input.description: XML document conforming to the ConnectionDetails Concept that contains the information required to execute a command via command line
The domain for which information will be obtained.
The IP address or hostname of the name server to use for the query.

output.description: XML document consisting of one or more <line> elements that contain the command response. Each <line> element contains an index attribute indicating the order in which the information was returned by the command.
Did the operation Succeed? Valid value: true.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <fat-command> <command os-id="Linux"> <xsl:text>/usr/bin/dig</xsl:text> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name server}') != 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> @${name server} </xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ${domain} any</xsl:text> </command> <command os-id="SunOS" os-version="5.8"> <xsl:text>/usr/sbin/nslookup -query=any ${domain}</xsl:text> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name server}') != 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ${name server}</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </command> <command os-id="SunOS" os-version="5.9"> <xsl:text>/usr/sbin/dig</xsl:text> <xsl:if test="string-length('${name server}') != 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> @${name server} </xsl:text> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ${domain} any</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </command> <command os-id="Windows Default"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">nslookup -query=any</xsl:text> <xsl:if test="string-length('${domain}') != 0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ${domain}</xsl:text> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length('${domain}') !=0 and string-length('${name server}') !=0"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> ${name server}</xsl:text> </xsl:if> </command> </fat-command> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="//output"> <output> <xsl:apply-templates select="//line" /> </output> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="//line"> <line> <xsl:call-template name="find-and-replace"> <xsl:with-param name="input" select="text()" /> <xsl:with-param name="search-string"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"><<>></xsl:text> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="replace-string"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">----</xsl:text> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </line> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="find-and-replace"> <xsl:param name="input" /> <xsl:param name="search-string" /> <xsl:param name="replace-string" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$search-string and contains($input,$search-string)"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($input, $search-string)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:value-of select="$replace-string" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:call-template name="find-and-replace"> <xsl:with-param name="input" select="substring-after($input, $search-string)" /> <xsl:with-param name="search-string" select="$search-string" /> <xsl:with-param name="replace-string" select="$replace-string" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$input" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="//output"> <output> <xsl:apply-templates select="//line" /> </output> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="//line"> <line> <xsl:call-template name="find-and-replace"> <xsl:with-param name="input" select="text()" /> <xsl:with-param name="search-string"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"><<</xsl:text> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="replace-string"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">--</xsl:text> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </line> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="find-and-replace"> <xsl:param name="input" /> <xsl:param name="search-string" /> <xsl:param name="replace-string" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$search-string and contains($input,$search-string)"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($input, $search-string)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:value-of select="$replace-string" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:call-template name="find-and-replace"> <xsl:with-param name="input" select="substring-after($input, $search-string)" /> <xsl:with-param name="search-string" select="$search-string" /> <xsl:with-param name="replace-string" select="$replace-string" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$input" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" /> <xsl:template match="//output"> <output> <xsl:apply-templates select="//line" /> </output> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="//line"> <line> <xsl:call-template name="find-and-replace"> <xsl:with-param name="input" select="text()" /> <xsl:with-param name="search-string"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">></xsl:text> </xsl:with-param> <xsl:with-param name="replace-string"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">-</xsl:text> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:call-template> </line> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="find-and-replace"> <xsl:param name="input" /> <xsl:param name="search-string" /> <xsl:param name="replace-string" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$search-string and contains($input,$search-string)"> <xsl:value-of select="substring-before($input, $search-string)" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:value-of select="$replace-string" disable-output-escaping="no" /> <xsl:call-template name="find-and-replace"> <xsl:with-param name="input" select="substring-after($input, $search-string)" /> <xsl:with-param name="search-string" select="$search-string" /> <xsl:with-param name="replace-string" select="$replace-string" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$input" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Query a domain server and get any and all information about the specified domain.
